headline: 3 No-Brainer Gold Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Gold is trading near all-time highs, resulting in it receiving much attention from investors.  Newmont and AngloGold Ashanti are leading gold mining companies.  The VanEck Gold Miners ETF is a great option for cautious investors who are uninterested in assuming the risks of a single gold mining company.

headline: 3 Stocks in the S&P 500 Index Have Done the Unthinkable and Rocketed at Least 45% This Year Despite Trump's Tariffs
summary: Broadly speaking, it's been a tough and volatile year for the stock market.  President Donald Trump's first 100 days proved tumultuous for the stock market.  Trump instituted tariffs in his bid to bring more manufacturing jobs back to the U.S. and shake up global trade.
